title: [Evil angels = A Cry in the dark : publicity kit]
brief_description: Publicity kit for the production Evil Angels (also known as “A Cry in the Dark”) (1988), including 19 B&W Stills (Large), 2 Press Kit/ Reviews, 1 B&W Negative. Director Fred Schepisi, Starring Meryl Streep, Sam Neill.
